revision.comment: [[Help:Cat-a-lot|Cat-a-lot]]: Moving from [[Category:Religious buildings completed in 1790]] to [[Category:Churches completed in 1790]]
revision.text:
{{Infobox church | name = Saint Nicholas Church | fullname = Crkva svetog Nikole
Црква светог Николе | dedication = [[Saint Nicholas]] | color = | image = Serbian Ortodox Chirch of Saint Nicola in Rijeka Croatia.JPG | imagesize = Saint Nicholas Church | caption = | denomination = [[Serbian Orthodox]] | architect = | style = Classical | constructed_date = 1790 | archdiocese = [[Eparchy of Upper Karlovac]] | country = [[Croatia]] | location = [[Rijeka]] }} The '''Church of St. Nicholas''' ({{lang-sr|Црква светог Николе/Crkva svetog Nikole}}) is a [[Serbian Orthodox]] church in [[Rijeka]], [[Croatia]]. The church is dedicated to [[Saint Nicholas]]. The building of the church was completed in 1790.{{cite web|url=http://www.rijeka.hr/Default.aspx?sec=781 |title=Grad Rijeka - Što posjetiti |publisher=Rijeka.hr |date= |accessdate=2012-10-02}} == History == The church was designed by local architect [[Ignazio Hencke]] in 1787 year and was built in 1790 using money of Orthodox Serbs who fled the [[Ottoman Empire]] and settled in [[Fiume]] ([[Rijeka]]) city in 1768. At the same time urban local authorities hindered the construction. The church kept numerous icons from monasteries in [[Bosnia (region)|Bosnia]] and [[Vojvodina]].{{cite web|url=http://www.rijeka.hr/Default.aspx?sec=781|title=Достопримечательности Риеки|publisher=|accessdate=2013-03-30}} Rijeka has a notable Serb minority (6.57% in 2011,{{Croatian Census 2011|E|08}} 11,24% in 1991), while the Serb-inhabited villages of [[Milaši]] and [[Moravice, Croatia|Moravice]] ([[Gorski kotar]]) historically gravitated towards Rijeka. == Gallery == File:Fiume--outlawsdiary00tormuoft.png|Fiume port in 1923. The Saint Nicolas Church in the center. File:Interior of Serbian Ortodox Saint Nicola church in RIjeka Croatia.JPG|Inside the Church. == See also == {{commons category|Saint Nicholas Church in Rijeka}} * [[Eparchy of Upper Karlovac]] * [[Rijeka]] * [[Serbs of Croatia]] == References == {{Reflist}} {{Serbian Orthodox churches|state=collapsed}} {{Serbian Orthodox Church in Croatia}} {{Serbian minority institutions and organizations in Croatia}} {{Coord|45.3259143|N|14.4427835|E|region:HR-08_type:landmark_dim:40|display=title|format=dms}} [[Category:Serbian Orthodox churches in Croatia]] [[Category:Buildings and structures in Rijeka]] [[Category:Primorje-Gorski Kotar County]] [[Category:Churches completed in 1790]] [[Category:1790 establishments in the Holy Roman Empire]] {{Croatia-church-stub}}
